content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the defendant has been ordered to pay legal and court fees in the final resolution the defendant has been awarded sole ownership of a ford galaxy vehicle the applicant claimed that the defendant acquired the car before the marriage and used their own funds to purchase it as a result the defendant gets to keep the car and the applicant will receive compensation the document explains the progress of the case involving two parties one of which is anonymized the applicant sought the dissolution of their marriage alleging constant tensions disagreements and violence from the defendant the applicant also requested ownership of the car without compensation and to retain their married name the defendant has not yet responded the court determined that the parties were married in vilnius and jointly own property the court awarded the car to the defendant without compensation and mentioned the possibility of joint debts the applicant has paid the necessary fees and the court orders the defendant to pay the applicants costs the court granted the applicants request to dissolve the marriage and will proceed to divide the matrimonial property the defendant has been ordered to pay the costs of the legal proceedings and an additional amount to the state budget

metadata.cost: 126.00 EUR (legal fees) + 17.92 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
